messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I’ve got the urge to battle with you.
Hope you’re willing to oblige!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
I shouldn’t have paid attention
to my urge...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
So long as my partner’s alongside me,
I’m willing to take on the world!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
The urge to battle you again has
struck me. Want to humor me?
